attributes.action: Introduce a 3 day weekend(Friday, Saturday and Sunday)
attributes.additional_details:
Kids would be more productive if there was a 3 day weekend and get to enjoy there personal life's instead of being in school and not have much family time when they arrive home.
They would have more time to complete any homework and social activities.
attributes.background: Make a three day weekend as teachers and students become more unenthusiastic to work and students are more likely to cause disputes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596
